nodes.text: A Livery Cruiser was a class of cruiser that was used during the New Republic Era. It was considered more "pleasant" for interstellar travel than gunships such as the Razor Crest. Around 9 ABY, a Mythrol on the ice planet of Maldo Kreis attempted to ingratiate himself to his captor—the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin—by suggesting that he could hail a Livery Cruiser for them.
Livery Cruisers were mentioned in dialogue in the first episode of the 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, which aired on November 12, 2019.
